The book was published by [[The Tolkien Society]] in [[2019]] under the auspices of the [[Peter Roe Memorial Fund]]. ==Contents== * "Introduction" by Anna Milon * "On the Providential Historicism of [[Middle-earth]]" by Ryan Haecker * "The Nature of Arda: An Artwork as the Embodiment of the [[Secret Fire|Flame Imperishable]]" by Aslı Bülbül Candaş * "Honouring the [[Valar]], Seeking the Elf Within: The Curious History of Tolkien Spirituality and the Religious Affordance of Tolkien's Literary Mythology" by Markus Altena Davidsen * "[[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]]'s [[Mandos]], [[Terry Pratchett|Pratchett]]'s Death" by Justin Lewis-Anthony * "Also Sprach [[Fëanor]], Spirit of Fire: A [[Friedrich Nietzsche|Nietzschean]] Reading of Tolkien's Mythology?" by Giovanni Carmine Costabile ==From the publisher== {{blockquote|This volume of proceedings contains papers from the largest and, perhaps, most diverse Tolkien Society Seminar to date. Following a much-contested Call for Papers, Tolkien the Pagan?
